channel.title: Running Servers
channel.description:
Hello,
I am trying to create my own RSPS, and I am going to do the following:
Download a client + server Code them to my liking Create a website Create a webclient Host a RSPS
But, when I try to download a client + server, I cannot seem to run the server. The client runs perfectly. Would it matter that I have 64-bit?
Thanks!
Here is what I get: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/5d9ou9.png[/img] My friend has downloaded the same server + client and it works for him

item.title: Running Servers
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you need to remove the mySQL because its still sending a packet through the server but can’t connect to it which won’t allow you to connect

Read full topic

item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

show us how u are doing this, eg: a script, an ide, command line

Read full topic

item.title: Running Servers
item.dc:creator: @Genetix-Pk Genetix-Pk
item.description:
@Genetix-Pk wrote:

Hello,

I am trying to create my own RSPS, and I am going to do the following:

Download a client + server
Code them to my liking
Create a website
Create a webclient
Host a RSPS

But, when I try to download a client + server, I cannot seem to run the server.
The client runs perfectly.
Would it matter that I have 64-bit?

Thanks!

Here is what I get:

5d9ou9.png1440×900

My friend has downloaded the same server + client and it works for him

Read full topic
